vision.notes: Likely present as they are not described as lacking vision in the context.

electroreception.notes: Cartilaginous fishes related to sharks, so inferred to have electroreception.

mechanoreception.notes: General sense of touch and pressure, inferred as present due to inhabiting freshwater environments and needing to detect prey and navigate.

chemoreception.notes: General sense of taste and smell, important for finding food in freshwater environments. Inferred to be present.
